instructions.name: apply_mutation
docs: Apply a permanent effect directly to canonical voter state.
Effects are mutations, not stored state. They are applied at write-time.

accounts.name: voter_account
docs: Target voter whose canonical state is mutated

instructions.name: create_question
docs: User pays from their vault; everything is denominated in dollars.

accounts.name: creator_user
docs: This is the creator of the post, used to derive the creator vault PDA
Marked as mut because Fed CPI requires it for init_if_needed on creator vault

instructions.name: distribute_parent_post_share
docs: Distribute parent post share from frozen settlement.
Reads mother_fee from PostMintPayout and transfers it to parent post's pot.

accounts.name: creator_user
docs: This is the creator of the parent post, used to derive the creator vault PDA
Marked as mut because Fed CPI requires it for init_if_needed on creator vault

instructions.name: distribute_protocol_fee
docs: Distribute protocol fee from frozen settlement.
Reads protocol_fee from PostMintPayout and transfers it to protocol treasury.

accounts.name: user_vault_token_account
docs: - keep opague so Fed TokenAccount cpi will initialize it and we won't be stopped by TokenAccount here

accounts.name: voter_user_vault_token_account
docs: - keep opague so Fed TokenAccount cpi will initialize it and we won't be stopped by TokenAccount here

accounts.name: creator_user
docs: This is the creator of the post, used to derive the creator vault PDA
Marked as mut because Fed CPI requires it for init_if_needed on creator vault

errors.name: BlingCannotBeAlternativePayment
errors.msg: BLING cannot be registered as an alternative payment

errors.name: AlternativePaymentAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Alternative payment already registered for this mint

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: user account does not belong to the payer

errors.name: InvalidSignatureInstruction
errors.msg: Invalid or missing Ed25519 signature verification instruction

errors.name: AnswerMustTargetQuestion
errors.msg: Answer must target a Question post

errors.name: AnswerTargetNotRoot
errors.msg: Answer target must be a Root post
